text: Sir George Howard Darwin, KCB FRS (9 July 1845 â€“ 7 December 1912) was an English astronomer and mathematician. He was born at Down House in Kent. His father was Charles Darwin (a famous biologist). His mother was Emma Darwin (Charles's wife). He worked at Cambridge University. title: George Darwin
